articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: German gas giant Uniper says the worst is still to come after Russia halts flows to Europe - CNBC
articles.description: Uniper, as Germany's biggest importer of gas, has been hit hard by vastly reduced gas flows via pipelines from Russia, which have sent prices soaring.
articles.content:
German energy giant Uniper on Tuesday warned the worst is still to come as concerns over Russian gas supplies to Europe through fall and winter continue to push up prices.
"I have said this a number… [+2937 chars]

articles.author: William Mata
articles.title: Russian-state backed Gazprom release video of winter in Europe without gas - Evening Standard
articles.description: Kremlin-loyal firm share video days after announcing indefinite shutdown of Nord Stream 1
articles.content:
Gazprom has released a video showing how Europe could freeze without Russian imported gas this winter.

articles.title: Citi close to €100mn deal for new European headquarters in Dublin - Financial Times
